title: 28 Funniest Memes for Feline Fanatics Who Understand the Impawtance of Keeping Cat Memes Alive
description: Hey there, feline fans. If you're of a certain age (that's a nice way of saying millennial or older), you probably have the same appreciation for memes as we do. You probably love cat memes just as much as we do, and maybe even more. How could you not? They are the purrfect form of memes - both hissterical and heartwarming, full of whiskery whimsy and wholesomeness.But as new generations of hoomans are born, memes become less and less impawtant to their culture. But not us. If we could, we would transport everyone back to the 2000s when our biggest problem was making sure our mom wasn't on the phone so we could connect to the internet. That's why we are here - to keep cat memes alive. To keep cats where they should be: as kings and queens of the internet. So enjoy this scroll of feline funnies, and make sure to share it with literally everyone you know. Bless you, you're doing Ceiling Cat's work.
author: Blake Seidel
excerpt: 28 Funniest Memes for Feline Fanatics Who Understand the Impawtance of Keeping Cat Memes Alive - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Hey there, feline fans. If you're of a certain age (that's a nice way of saying millennial or older), you probably have the same appreciation for memes as we do. You probably love cat memes just as much as we do, and maybe even more. How could you not? They are the purrfect form of memes - both hissterical and heartwarming, full of whiskery whimsy and wholesomeness.

But as new generations of hoomans are born, memes become less and less impawtant to their culture. But not us. If we could, we would transport everyone back to the 2000s when our biggest problem was making sure our mom wasn't on the phone so we could connect to the internet. That's why we are here - to keep cat memes alive. To keep cats where they should be: as kings and queens of the internet. So enjoy this scroll of feline funnies, and make sure to share it with literally everyone you know. Bless you, you're doing Ceiling Cat's work.
